summary: This document is a financial statement for the Angara Trust account managed by UBS Resource Management. It details the account's assets, liabilities, and transactions for January 2019, including significant withdrawals and changes in account value. The document highlights the financial management of the trust and the performance of its investments.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is identified as the financial advisor managing the Angara Trust account, providing investment advice and overseeing account activities.

persons.name: Nutter McClennen & Fish
persons.context: Nutter McClennen & Fish is mentioned as the legal representative associated with the Angara Trust, indicating their involvement in the trust's management.

connections.description: Scott Stackman serves as the financial advisor for the Angara Trust, managing its investments and financial activities.
Nutter McClennen & Fish is the legal representative for the Angara Trust, indicating a professional relationship in managing legal matters.

events.title: Account Value Assessment
events.description: The document provides an assessment of the Angara Trust account value as of January 3, 2019, showing assets of $387,182.65 and no liabilities.

events.title: Monthly Account Activity
events.description: The statement summarizes the account activity for January 2019, including significant withdrawals totaling $389,995.60.

keyFacts: The Angara Trust account had a total asset value of $387,182.65 as of January 3, 2019.
There were significant withdrawals from the Angara Trust account totaling $389,995.60 during January 2019.
Scott Stackman is the financial advisor managing the Angara Trust account.
Nutter McClennen & Fish is the legal representative associated with the Angara Trust.
The document provides a detailed financial overview of the Angara Trust's performance and management.
